title: All-Star Game '21, Blake Griffin's Fit & Pelicans 2nd Half
description:
Brian Windhorst, Marc Spears, and Andrew Lopez discuss the 2021 All-Star Game, how the NBA is going to handle the COVID-19 vaccination process for the league, Blake Griffin’s fit with the Brooklyn Nets, and the second-half outlook for the New Orleans Pelicans. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
